mapper.select: select q.question_id, q.question_description, a.password_answer_id, a.user_id, a.password_question_answer from Password_Question q inner join Password_Answer a on q.question_id = a.question_id where a.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into Password_Answer (user_id, question_id, password_question_answer) values (#{userId}, #{questionId}, #{passwordQuestionAnswer})
